document_data.caption: A sample of sal ammoniac.
document_data.name: Sal ammoniac
document_data.mainbody: '''Sal ammoniac''' was a mineral [[salt]] used in alchemy and metalworking.
document_data.Usages:
* Sal ammoniac was used to distil [[aqua fortis]] into [[aqua regia]], used to purify gold.
* Sal ammoniac had some use in alloying [[adamantine]], [[iron]], and [[molybdena]] together.
